19164.<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>「そ:

19166.<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>「…:

19167.<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>「<:

19169.<start_lip_sync n01515 _normal m00001>「こ:
